channel.title: Unnikrishnan on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Unnikrishnan on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Azhage Azhagu: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This is a translation of a recent song from a movie called Saivam that my mum recommended I listen to. I listened to it last night and fell in love with the voice.

item.title: Uyirum Niye Udalum Niye: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: I found this song unintentionally. It is composed by A.R. Rahman and sung by Unnikrishnan. **uyirum neeye udalum neeye uravum neeye thaaye(2)** You are life, you are the body,
